aboutMe.information: I am a passionate developer, autonomous, with adaptability to new ways of working, I like to participate in projects outside my comfort zone, have a broader field of my knowledge as a developer, learn from new experiences and the work groups that make me up. , and know more about the meaning of programming
aboutMe.information2: When doing a job, I do everything necessary and deliver a good project, so that users and clients feel satisfied with the work done.
aboutMe.information3: If I don't know necesary information, I investigate from reliable sources to carry out a good development and good practices in my workspace
